name: Tina Tena Ansah
text: Excited to have this location open on the Westside. The pizza was delicious! Their small pizza was thick with ample toppings, and enough to share with another person (unless you're both starving, get your own small). A flavorful garlic ‚Ä¶More

name: Ash B
text: Sweet Staff. Best pizza around. Old school crust. Not greasy at all. Grab a salad, wings or even a sub

name: Matthew Gantz
text: Stop #67 for @pizzas365: Marco's Pizza has a pretty fair price for some high quality, classic pizza. Not too many unique options, but I can assure you they excel at the thin crust. 4.0 Stars.

name: Glenn M
text: For a chain, which I have never heard of before, the pizza is very good. Been twice. Staff is also very nice.

name: Brian McDonnell
text: Good pizza and great service. I will definitely eat here again.

name: Amy Prindle
text: Bland unhealthy pizza. Good if you wanna order for fast delivery, but the price doesn't really match the quality.
